Class
Description
AddItemCommand
Class - the command to add a product to the catalog
AddItemToCartCommand
Class - the command to add an item to the cart
AddToBlacklistCommand
Class - a command to add a user to the blacklist
AuthorizationCommand
Class - user authorization command in the program
ChangeItemsDetailsCommand
Class - command for changing product data in the catalog
Command
Interface containing methods of all program commands
CommandName
A class containing the names of all program commands
CommandProvider
The explorer class redirects to a specific command in accordance with the request
ConnectionPool
Database Connection Explorer class
ConnectionPoolException
A class that collects all database explorer exceptions
Controller
Servlet class
DaoException
A class that collects all the exceptions of the DAO layer
DaoProvider
The explorer class redirects to a specific class of the DAO layer
DBParameter
A class containing database parameters
DBResourceManager
A class that manages information about the database
DeleteItemCommand
Class - the command to delete an item from the catalog
DeleteItemFromCartCommand
Class - the command to remove an item from the cart
ExitCommand
Class - exit command from the program
GoAddItemCommand
Class - a command to go to the page of adding a product to the catalog
GoAdminPageCommand
Class - the command to go to the user's page as an administrator
GoAuthorizationCommand
Class - the command to go to the authorization page

Class - the command to go to the product information change page
GoClientPageCommand
Class - the command to go to the user's page as a client
GoPayCommand
Class - the command to go to the order payment page
GoRegistrationCommand
Class - the command to go to the user registration page
Item
A class describing the product entity
ItemDao
Interface of the DAO layer containing methods that work with the Item entity
ItemService
Interface of the Service layer containing methods that work with the Item entity
ItemServiceImpl
A class of the Service layer containing methods for working with the Item entity
ItemValidator
An interface containing methods for verifying the correctness of the Item entity data
ItemValidatorImpl
Item Entity data validation class
JSPPageName
A class containing all available pages in the program
MakeOrderCommand
Class - command to place an order
MakePaymentCommand
Class - order payment execution command
NoSuchCommand
Class - command in case of an error

Class describing the order entity

Interface of the DAO layer containing methods that work with the Order entity
OrderService
Interface of the Service layer containing methods that work with the Order entity
OrderServiceImpl
A class of the Service layer containing methods for working with the Order entity
Payment
A class describing the payment entity
PaymentDao
Interface of the DAO layer containing methods that work with the Order and Payment entities
PaymentService
Interface of the Service layer containing methods that work with the Payment and Order entity
PaymentServiceImpl
A class of the Service layer containing methods for working with the Order and Payment entity
PaymentValidator
An interface containing methods for verifying the correctness of the Payment entity data
PaymentValidatorImpl
Validation class for the Payment entity data
RegistrationCommand
Class - user registration command
RequestParamName
A class containing possible requests from the page in the attribute of the request variable
Role
A class describing user roles
ServiceException
A class that collects all exceptions of the Service layer
ServiceProvider
The explorer class redirects to a specific class of the Service layer

Class - the command to display all products in the basket

Class - the command to display all products in the catalog

A class of the DAO layer containing methods for working with the Order and Payment entity
SQLUserDao
A class of the DAO layer containing methods for working with the User entity

A class describing the user's entity
UserBuilder
A class that allows you to create objects of the User class by initializing different variables

A class describing the user's status

Explorer class redirecting to a specific data validation class
